00035     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     class GridScene : public QGraphicsScene
00039     {
00040     public:
00044         GridScene(QWidget* parent) : QGraphicsScene(parent) {}
00045 
00049         ~GridScene() {}
00050 
00051     protected:
00053         void drawBackground(QPainter* painter, QRectF const& rect);
00054     };
00055 
00056     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057     // Function: drawBackground()
00058     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059     void GridScene::drawBackground(QPainter* painter, QRectF const& rect)
00060     {
00061         painter->setWorldMatrixEnabled(true);
00062         painter->setBrush(Qt::lightGray);
00063 
00064         qreal left = int(rect.left()) - (int(rect.left()) % GridSize );
00065         qreal top = int(rect.top()) - (int(rect.top()) % GridSize );
00066 
00067         for (qreal x = left; x < rect.right(); x += GridSize ) {
00068             for (qreal y = top; y < rect.bottom(); y += GridSize )
00069                 painter->drawPoint(x, y);
00070         }
00071     }
00072 }

00074 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 // Function: ComponentPreviewBox()
00076 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 ComponentPreviewBox::ComponentPreviewBox(LibraryInterface* lh) : lh_(lh), component_(), scene_(0)
00078 {
00079     // Create the scene.
00080     scene_ = new GridScene(this);
00081     setScene(scene_);
00082     centerOn(0, 0);
00083 
00084         setMinimumHeight(MIN_BOX_HEIGHT);
00085 
00086     // Disable interactivity.
00087     setInteractive(false);
00088 }

00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 // Function: updatePreview()
00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 void ComponentPreviewBox::updatePreview()
00101 {
00102     // Re-create the scene.
00103     delete scene_;
00104     scene_ = new GridScene(this);
00105     setScene(scene_);
00106     //centerOn(0, 0);
00107 
00108     if (component_ != 0)
00109     {
00110         QGraphicsItem* item = 0;
00111 
00112         switch (component_->getComponentImplementation())
00113         {
00114         case KactusAttribute::KTS_HW:
00115             {
00116                 // Create the diagram component.
00117                 item = new DiagramComponent(lh_, component_, component_->getVlnv()->getName());
00118                 break;
00119             }
00120 
00121         case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW:
00122             {
00123                 switch (component_->getComponentSWType())
00124                 {
00125                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION:
00126                     {
00127                         item = new ApplicationItem(component_, component_->getVlnv()->getName());
00128                         break;
00129                     }
00130 
00131                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS:
00132                     {
00133                         item = new ProgramEntityItem(component_, component_->getVlnv()->getName());
00134                         break;
00135                     }
00136 
00137                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM:
00138                     {
00139                         item = new PlatformComponentItem(component_, component_->getVlnv()->getName());
00140                         break;
00141                     }
00142 
00143                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING:
00144                     {
00145                         item = new MappingComponentItem(0, lh_, component_, component_->getVlnv()->getName());
00146                     }
00147                 }
00148                 break;
00149             }
00150         }
00151         
00152         if (item != 0)
00153         {
00154             scene_->addItem(item);
00155         }
00156     }
00157 }
00158 
00159 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 // Function: setComponent()
00161 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 void ComponentPreviewBox::setComponent(QSharedPointer<Component> component)
00163 {
00164     component_ = component;
00165     updatePreview();
00166 }
00167 
00168 void ComponentPreviewBox::setComponent( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00169         QSharedPointer<Component> component;
00170         
00171         // if the vlnv belongs to a component
00172         if (lh_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00173                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh_->getModel(vlnv);
00174                 component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00175         }
00176         setComponent(component);
00177 }

00179 QRectF ComponentPreviewBox::itemsBoundingRect() const {
00180         return scene_->itemsBoundingRect();
00181 }
